name: Beat the traffic:Be road boss
description:
Had enough of the fast and furious car racing games? Let’s give the classic car chase games a real twist!!
Traffic turns the most docile being to a warrior at times! Especially the peak hour madness that has you wishing you could switch to top gear and speed off, screaming in frustration!

Experience traffic as a fun sport- without the frenzy and frustrations associated with it!!

The gameplay here is simple- drive through traffic at top speed, take a left turn against oncoming traffic.
The more cars you get through, the higher your score. Master the skill and show off to your rivals!!

How To Play:

• Tap to take left

Features:

• Amazing graphics- intricate detailing put together to give a realistic look
• Simple tap controls
• Realistic sound effects
• Endless gameplay
• Game center integrated

Download this super exciting game now! Beat the rush, perfect your timing in driving and master the game- become the off-road legend with your skills!!
